participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and inquisitive, always seeking to learn more about others.
participant_1.background: i am pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago.

participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. i'm four. i have a pet turtle. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.
